rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0001
rows.name:
You have a keen eye to hire one such
as myself... Ah, forgive me. I mean,
thank you very much for hiring me.

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0002
rows.name:
This is a job I feel I can contribute to.
Yes, I think I'm going to be very happy
here.

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0003
rows.name:
I shall aim to curtail any needless
expense, that we may streamline the
Merc Group. Think yourselves lucky!

rows.label: tlk4240004301_msg0004
rows.name:
...I'm sorry. That's the pompous
nobility talk again, isn't it?
